messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Ford
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/8/2003 10:45:48 AM Eastern Standard Time, ... I heard on Paul Harvey s The rest of the Story once, that Clint Eastwood was raised his
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/8/2003 10:45:48 AM Eastern Standard Time,
kbcdlovejo@... writes:

> >Almost as interesting as searching out your birth mother and discovering
> >that
> >it's Joni Mitchell.
> >
>
> Haven't read any further. Still VERY behind.
>
> Harrison Ford is Joni Mitchell's love child? <G>
>
>
I heard on Paul Harvey's "The rest of the Story" once, that Clint Eastwood
was raised his whole life thinking that his grandma was his mom, and his mom was
his sister. Didn't find out till much later that he was his "sister's"
illegitimate son.

Nancy


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Ford
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/1/2003 2:20:18 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Haven t read any further. Still VERY behind. Harrison Ford is Joni Mitchell s love child?
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/1/2003 2:20:18 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> Oh, another Harrison Ford tidbit that redeems him a bit.
>
> In his spare time he's a helicopter pilot, and he volunteers doing rescue
> missions. He's apparently saved a couple lives. Can you imagine being
> rescued by
> Han Solo?
>
> Almost as interesting as searching out your birth mother and discovering
> that
> it's Joni Mitchell.
>

Haven't read any further. Still VERY behind.

Harrison Ford is Joni Mitchell's love child? <G>

~Kelly <STILL Giggling!>
